title: Fushigi na Somera-chan
synopsis: The story follows the everyday life of Somera Nonomoto who can use the strongest kenpo, Nonomoto Mahou-ken, which is inherited from her mother with her younger sister Kukuru.
staff: [['Imazaki, Itsuki', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Oomuro, Masakatsu', ['Sound Director']], ['Choboraunyopomi', ['Original Creator']], ['Hatori, Fuuga', ['Music']]]
